value: L1 700 Springvale Rd, Mulgrave, 3170, VIC, Australia

5162 - Plastics Materials and Basic Forms and Shapes Summary > COVESTRO PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover plastics materials and basic forms and shapes. The company is involved in the import and export of goods. COVESTRO PTY LTD is headquartered in Mulgrave, Victoria. It is headed by director & company secretary Samir Hifri. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $33.85 million. Its net profit totalled $726,000. COVESTRO PTY LTD forms part of the wholesale trade industry sector.
